TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit InvokeWebServiceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains event data used to invoke a Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object proxyInstance) cil managed

Docs.param: The Web service proxy <xref:System.Object> to use for outgoing Web service calls.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the proxy class that communicates with the Web service.
Docs.value: The proxy <xref:System.Object> that communicates with the Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The proxy <xref:System.Object> accessed by this property can be used for outgoing Web service calls for header manipulation, security, and encryption.
